Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Westbound Reroute near Van Buren/Ashland
ShortDescription: WB 126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Van Buren, Ashland, Harrison, Wolcott, Ogden, and Van Buren due to, construction near Van Buren/Ashland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Van Buren, Ashland, Harrison, Wolcott, Ogden, and Van Buren due to, construction near Van Buren/Ashland.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #56 Milwaukee Temporary Southbound Reroute near Milwaukee/Division
ShortDescription: Southbound 56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Ashland, Augusta, and Milwaukee due to, construction near Milwaukee/Division.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Ashland, Augusta, and Milwaukee due to, construction near Milwaukee/Division. 

Northbound buses are not affected. 

Allow extra travel time.
